snippet: Ron Barber, a Democrat and former aide to Gabrielle Giffords, and Jesse Kelly, his Republican opponent, will square off in a House race on Tuesday.
abstract: Democrat Ron Barber and Republican Jesse Kelly make their final appeals to voters in a tight race to fill the Arizona Congressional seat vacated by Gabrielle Giffords; Barber holds a rally that is attended by Giffords, who has endorsed him as her successor.
lead_paragraph: Ron Barber, a Democrat and former aide to Gabrielle Giffords, and Jesse Kelly, his Republican opponent, will square off in a House race on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Final Push in Race to Finish Giffords’s House Term
headline.main: Final Push in Race to Serve Out Giffords’s House Term
headline.print_headline: Final Push in Race to Serve Out Giffords’s House Term
